panels.description: Shows the maximum number of concurrent reconciliations per controller.
panels.title: Max Concurrent Reconciliations

panels.description: Shows the active workers per controller.
panels.title: Active Controller Workers

panels.description: Shows the total number of reconciliations per controller.
panels.title: Number of Reconciliations For Result "$result"

panels.description: Shows the total number of reconciliation errors per controller.
panels.title: Reconciliation Errors

panels.description: Shows the length per reconciliation per controller.
panels.title: Length of Reconciliation Times (${percentile}th Percentile)

panels.description: Shows the reconciliation rate per controller.
panels.title: Reconciliation Rate

panels.description: Shows the total number of admission requests being served.
panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Shows the current number of admission requests being served.
panels.title: Inflight Requests

panels.description: Shows the latency of processing admission requests.
panels.title: Latency (${percentile}th Percentile)

panels.description: Shows the latency of processing admission requests.
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: Shows the total number of HTTP requests.
panels.title: HTTP Requests For API Server

panels.description: Shows how long an item stays in the workqueue before being requested.
panels.title: Queue Duration (${percentile}th Percentile)

panels.description: Shows how long it takes to process an item.
panels.title: Work Duration (${percentile}th Percentile)

panels.description: Shows how many items of the workqueue are processed.
panels.title: Work Rate

panels.description: Shows the current length of the workqueue.
panels.title: Queue Length

panels.description: Shows the total number of adds to the work queue.
panels.title: Enqueues

panels.description: Shows the total number of retries handled by the workqueue.
panels.title: Retries

panels.description: Shows for how many seconds the longest running processor for a workqueue has been running.
panels.title: Longest Running Processor

panels.description: Shows for how many seconds of work has been done that is in progress and hasn't been observed by work_duration. Large values indicate stuck threads. One can deduce the number of stuck threads by observing the rate at which this increases.
panels.title: Unfinished Work
